charities.name: Free World
charities.description: Across the globe, totalitarian governments oppress and control their people by limiting access to crucial information and stifling their ability to speak. Here at Free World, we believe that every voice deserves to be heard, and that nobody has the right to deny others their basic human rights. So we started an international non-profit that fights to bring freedom to all.
charities.long_description: Across the globe, totalitarian governments oppress and control their people by limiting access to crucial information and stifling their ability to speak. Here at Free World, we believe that every voice deserves to be heard, and that nobody has the right to deny others their basic human rights. So we started an international non-profit that fights to bring freedom to all.

charities.name: Life Drops
charities.description: For some, what many people consider as a normal life has never been normal. Depression, anxiety, overworking and abuse can leave many trapped in a shell that is nearly impossible to escape on your own. Life Drops is a global non-profit focused on empowering people on their journeys and helping them create and celebrate the moments of health and happiness.
charities.long_description: For some, what many people consider as a normal life has never been normal. Depression, anxiety, overworking and abuse can leave many trapped in a shell that is nearly impossible to escape on your own. Life Drops is a global non-profit focused on empowering people on their journeys and helping them create and celebrate the moments of health and happiness.

charities.name: Greenleaf
charities.description: The hard truth is we’ve done a lot of damage to the environment. Lack of foresight, empathy and regulations have left our world scarred by our unrelenting desire to expand our human presence, no matter the costs. Greenleaf is a charity focused on turning that tide, and helping the environment heal and restore balance to this world.
charities.long_description: The hard truth is we’ve done a lot of damage to the environment. Lack of foresight, empathy and regulations have left our world scarred by our unrelenting desire to expand our human presence, no matter the costs. Greenleaf is a charity focused on turning that tide, and helping the environment heal and restore balance to this world.

charities.name: Pup Pops
charities.description: Hello from Pup Pops! We are an international organization here to serve humankind's best friends by providing medical assistance to our canine companions who have suffered from neglect, cruelty, starvation or are just lost and in need of a home.
charities.long_description: Hello from Pup Pops! We are an international organization here to serve humankind's best friends by providing medical assistance to our canine companions who have suffered from neglect, cruelty, starvation or are just lost and in need of a home.
